content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
How many times have the night-time noise and enforcement team been sent to student HMOs or properties in the past 5 years in the city of Sheffield.
Broken down by year (Jan-Dec)
Yours faithfully,
James Little

Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please pass this on to the person who conducts Freedom of Information reviews.
I am writing to request an internal review of Sheffield City Council's handling of my FOI request 'Night time noise team attendance'.
There has been no response to this FOI.
A full history of my FOI request and all correspondence is available on the Internet at this address:
https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/n...
Yours faithfully,
James Little
